Abstract .A machine translation system may use non - parallel monolingual corpora to generate a translation lexicon .The system may identify identically spelled words in the two corpora , and use them as a seed lexicon .The system may use various clues , e.g. , context and frequency , to identify and score other possible translation pairs , using the seed lexicon as a basis .
